"In Battledia: Purple, you will fight a succession of very powerful enemies.

The rewards you get are based on the number of enemies you defeat. You can earn the biggest possible reward by defeating all enemies within the time limit.

"Battle Triggers can be obtained as drops from enemies, and can also be purchased from My Shops."
